channel.title: Help im new and i want to make a client
channel.description: so i think i made the sever right but now i want to make a simple clinet plz help me :confused: :confused:

item.title: Help im new and i want to make a client
item.dc:creator: @Faerochi Faerochi
item.description:
@Faerochi wrote:

Because 0.0.0.0 will direct him to localhost. If he wants to make his own clientto post it out then if he wants it to direct to another server localhost IP wont help.

Obviously I’m entirely wrong if he wants to make a public client.

Read full topic
item.source: Help im new and i want to make a client

item.title: Help im new and i want to make a client
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Faerochi, post:3, topic:318016”][quote author=Jonnydpickle link=topic=414526.msg3051657#msg3051657 date=1260125689]
Well im not to good with RSPS myself but you need a client base.
cant be found here on the forums
then you download the base
then extract it to ur desktop
then in the files something called
gui.java or egui.java
click it search for “ip”
and change to local host 0.0.0.0
[/quote]

He said he wanted to make a client. Not get a personalized client. Changing the IP to 0.0.0.0 won’t help. Other than that though, that’s right.[/quote]

why won’t changing the ip to 0.0.0.0 not help?

Read full topic
item.source: Help im new and i want to make a client
